post.body: Taylor Kitsch = Gambit = GUH.
What, does it have, like, a smog additive or something?
@emily83176 *gasps and clutches pearls* You wouldn't DARE!
Hey, congrats on the Sony Reader thing! That's awesome!
That could be dangerous; you might slip. :-D
I kick ass on Jeopardy and nobody ever wants to play Trivial Pursuit with me.
Heh. ;-)
This will be my 1st winter here (So. MA), so I dunno. I'm from south of the Manson-Nixon line where snow is a rarity.
It's supposed to snow here tonight, but I'm not counting on it. If they say sunny and warm, then I'll break out the shovel.
Aww, I've been fighting a sinus headache all day so I can sympathize. Barometric pressure changes kill me.
You're welcome, and congratulations!
Too late; you can haz emailz. :-)
Oh, all right. I'll make you an ARC copy of that one too. *smiles*
Hey, I see a familiar name on Night Owl Romance's Best of 2008 GLBTQ poll. :-) http://tinyurl.com/4wm2q3
Glad you like! *squee* Soon as we get trib copy of SC2 from TQ, it's yours.
eXcessica, in ebook format via their site, also Fictionwise, ARe, BooksOnBoard, etc. Paperback to follow shortly at Amazon, etc.
Another present in your inbox.
You gots email. With an attachment. ;-)
Um, you should have ARCs for both the SC short and for "Soft Focus" in a few hours. :-)
Nice job on the story! :Just read it, and will read again and comment tomorrow when I'm more awakey. -)
Just finished editing the Jace and Konnor short. Reno will proof it in the morning, then you can have the ARC.
I'm here!
O.O Wow, that was one helluva Twitter to see upon signing on. *crosses legs*
Reno's vacation starts a day earlier than expected! SWEET!
Researchers say men are turned on by the smell of cinnamon rolls + spend more money when thinking about sex. Ergo, Cinnabon kiosks in malls.
I want to be snowed in with my man and a gallon of tequila this weekend. We have smut to write: demons and angels and more demons, oh my!
Konnor wants a Prince Nuada blow-up doll for Christmas. Just sayin'.
Good morning, Twitterbugs! I see you've all been busy today already, lol.
Going to go drool over Prince Nuada in Hellboy II now. Night night, Twitterbugs.
Um, I hesitate to point this out, but the 12 days of Christmas *begin* with Christmas Day not end with it.
Good morning, Twitterbugs. It snowed last night, but it was melted by the time we woke up.
A much-needed update: http://jaye-valentine.livejournal.com/
Biting and blood play and breath play, oh my!
Man, this has been one long frickin' day.
Good afternoon, Twitterbugs! Should have release dates for StarCrossed short and Soft Focus novel from pub soon! *is excited*
Randomly, jackboots.
Listening to Rob Zombie's "Dragula" loud enough to make my ears bleed. Randomly, it has no cowbell, but still. Great song. :-D
Randomly, I need more cowbell.
New StarCrossed short story (6K) has been revised, edited, and proofed. Cover art in progress by Reno. Title: "Sangria and Seraphim"
Good afternoon, Twitterbugs.
